Mailing Address: PO Box 21130Orchard Park POKelowna, BC     V1Y 9N8
Primary Contact: Jan Schulz, Executive Director; Phone: 778.363.6403; Email: info@innfromthecoldkelowna.org
Alternate Contact: Aoife Stavrianos, Inn Home Support Coordinator; Phone: 778.363.6403; Email: jordan@innfromthecoldkelowna.org
Service Details: - Responds to the needs of people experiencing, or at-risk of, homelessness Services and Programs Include: - The Inn: provides emergency, overnight, year round shelter; located at 1157 Sutherland Ave- Outreach and Case Management: one-to-one assistance in manageable goal setting, and navigating the complex service/agency systems in order to meet these goals; Five key area of support are provided:  housing, medical resources, mental health, addictions treatment, Ministry of Social Development- Inn Home Support Program: provides support to vulnerable individuals who would benefit for a one-on-one relationship with a caring volunteer; program was established to provide support to persons who are presently housed, often in somewhat precarious situations who may or may not have been homeless in the past- Kelowna Kodiaks: local homeless street soccer team; practices twice a week, travels to tournaments, plays in an indoor league against regular teams- Free Store: offers free clothing, outdoor gear and toiletries, available to guests and the community at large; open Mon-Wed, 9:00am - 12:00pm
Hours: Office Hours: Mon-Thu, 8:30am - 4:30pm @ 1829 Chandler StWinter Shelter Intake Hours: 7:00pm - 8:00pm @ 1157 Sutherland Ave
Dates: Year Round: Inn Home Support, Outreach/Case Management, Street Soccer, Free StoreWinter: Shelter
Eligibility: Ages: 19 year(s) and upPet-friendly shelter welcomes animal companions
How to Apply: - Please call or visit the office- Drop-ins welcome
Address & Map: Administration Office1262 St. Paul St, #109Kelowna, BC     V1Y 2C9View MapQuest Map
Major Intersection: St Paul St and Doyle Ave
Accessibility: - Administration office is wheelchair accessible- No wheelchair access at the shelter.
